title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: Tall grasses mix with bracken and stunted trees on the slopes of shallow hills.  Black against the eastern night sky, the top of an ancient tower peers menacingly over the crests of the intervening hills.
Tall grasses mix with bracken and stunted trees on the slopes of shallow hills.  Just visible to the east, the top of an ancient tower peers menacingly over the crests of the intervening hills.
